translations: n．疏远，疏离：指人与人之间关系的破裂或距离感的产生。
· The estrangements between family members can be painful.
家庭成员之间的疏远可能会让人痛苦。

sentences.sentence: Make career changes that may increase your income. Difficulties with female members of your family may result in estrangements.
sentences.translation: 与女性家庭成员的矛盾会让你们变得疏远。

sentences.sentence: On the other hand, it also has some negative effects to the western country area in that in a sense it pricks up estrangements between cities and countries.
sentences.translation: 另一方面，大众传播的存在对西部农村地区也有着不利的作用。在某种程度上，它加深了城市与农村之间的隔膜。
